page.title: 20TRADE IN DEERNESS
page.content: There is only one retail outlet, the {general merchants}store, which sells everything from groceries to coal. A family business, it also employs two part-time employees. At the old school nearby there is a small {food-processing business}producing pate, seafood dishes and flans. Two people are employed part-time and it distributes locally in the Orkney Islands and to mainland Scotland. A one unit{haulage business}handling principally livestock, but also building materials and farm supplies operates from Deerness. There is an {agricultural contractor}employing three people who contracts for baling, silage-cutting and other farm-related works. A{building-contractor}and {driving instructor}also have businesses in Deerness.
